comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: Looks to be en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Victoriano_Huerta "José Victoriano Huerta Márquez (22 December 1850 – 13 January 1916) was a Mexican military officer and president of Mexico. Huerta's supporters were known as Huertistas during the Mexican Revolution. Huerta is still vilified by modern-day Mexicans, who generally refer to him as El Chacal ("The Jackal") or El Usurpador ("The Usurper")." See also www.pbs.org/itvs/storm-that-swept-mexico/the-revolution/f... He was President of Mexico from 19 February 1913 to 15 July 1914 and died in the U.S. in January 1916.

comment.author: 35234565@N04
comment._content: Thank you for your great research swanq. We'll add some of this information to the record the next time we update.
